Exercise 1
sqrt(2) = 1.4142135623731
exppi = 23.1406926327793
piexp = 22.459157718361
sqrt2*sqrt2 = 2 (should be equal 2)
ln(exppi) = 3.14159265358979 (should be equal 3.14159265358979)
log10(piexp) = 2.71828182845905 (should be equal 2.71828182845905)

Exercise 2
gamma(-3.5)=0.270088208108619
gamma(-2.5)=-0.945308728380167
gamma(-1.5)=2.36327182095042
gamma(1)=0.999999989064903
gamma(2)=0.999999989064903
gamma(3)=1.99999997812981
gamma(10)=362879.997652016

Exercise 3
lngamma(-3.5) = -1.30900667663892
lngamma(-2.5) = NaN
lngamma(-1.5) = 0.860047023730604
lngamma(1) = -1.0935097442935E-08
lngamma(2) = -1.0935097442935E-08
lngamma(3) = 0.693147169624848
lngamma(10) = 12.8018274736111
Then we can get
Exp(lngamma(-3.5)) = 0.270088208108619
Exp(lngamma(-2.5)) = NaN
Exp(lngamma(-1.5)) = 2.36327182095042
Exp(lngamma(1)) = 0.999999989064903
Exp(lngamma(2)) = 0.999999989064903
Exp(lngamma(3)) = 1.99999997812981
Exp(lngamma(10)) = 362879.997652016
